rules_text:
First strike
Whenever Moreu attacks, if five or more creatures are attacking, you may cast a copy of it's back side without paying it's mana cost.
rules_text2: Untap each creature you control. Until end of turn creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain “{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.”
flavor_text2: [i]Moreu represents fiery passion, and believes in taking things on with a smile [/i]
